The supporting cast includes Valentina Cervi, James Badge Dale, Kelly Reilly, and Emmanuelle Seigner.

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to more recent Disney fairy tales, thanks to computer graphics. The biggest mistake to my point of view is a pretty traditional one, that of a good human character obliged to get killed for the sake of the good girl with the found lost brother and the saved forest and all of that.

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is the first of three starring the same character played by Dudikoff. Well, it is an enjoyable one and if you like lots of action and a story with few twists it is probably one for you.
